conversation.speaker: patient
conversation.text: Hi, I'm not feeling well today.

conversation.speaker: ai
conversation.text: Hi there! What brings you to talk with me today?

conversation.speaker: patient
conversation.text: My chest pressure started 2 days ago.

conversation.speaker: ai
conversation.text: How long have you been experiencing this?

conversation.speaker: patient
conversation.text: It comes and goes, but this time it's been persistent.

conversation.speaker: ai
conversation.text: Do you have any known allergies?

conversation.speaker: patient
conversation.text: I'm worried about it.

conversation.speaker: ai
conversation.text: Are there any other symptoms you're noticing?

conversation.speaker: patient
conversation.text: I'm not really sure.

conversation.speaker: ai
conversation.text: Have you experienced this before?

conversation.speaker: patient
conversation.text: I hope it gets better soon.

conversation.speaker: ai
conversation.text: On a scale of 1-10, how would you rate your pain?

conversation.speaker: patient
conversation.text: Not too bad, maybe a 3 or 4.

conversation.speaker: ai
conversation.text: Given your condition, it's important to seek emergency medical care immediately.

recommended_actions: call 911 or go to the emergency room right away
